verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H5011>Nob<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest:<s%> and <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> was <S%H2729>afraid<s%> at the <S%H7125>meeting<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4069>Why<s%> are you <S%H905>alone,<s%> and <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> with you?

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> The <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me a <S%H1697>business,<s%> and has <S%H559>said<s%> to me, Let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3972>any<s%> <S%H1697>thing<s%> of the <S%H1697>business<s%> about <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> you, and <S%H834>what<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you: and I have <S%H3045>appointed<s%> my <S%H5288>servants<s%> to <S%H492>such<s%> and <S%H492>such<s%> a <S%H4725>place.<s%>

Now therefore <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H8478>under<s%> your <S%H3027>hand?<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> me <S%H2568>five<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> what there is <S%H4672>present.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2455>common<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> my <S%H3027>hand,<s%> but there is <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5288>young<s%> men have <S%H8104>kept<s%> themselves <S%H389>at<s%> <S%H389>least<s%> from <S%H802>women.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Of a <S%H3588>truth<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H802>women<s%> have been <S%H6113>kept<s%> from us about these <S%H8032>three<s%> <S%H8543>days,<s%> since I <S%H3318>came<s%> out, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of the <S%H5288>young<s%> men are <S%H6944>holy,<s%> and the bread is in a <S%H1870>manner<s%> <S%H2455>common,<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> it were <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> in the <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>

So the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H6944>hallowed<s%> bread: for there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> but the show <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H6440><s%> that was <S%H5493>taken<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2527>hot<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when it was <S%H3947>taken<s%> away.

Now a certain <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was there that <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H6113>detained<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1673>Doeg,<s%> an <S%H130>Edomite,<s%> the most <S%H47>chief<s%> of the <S%H7462>herdsmen<s%> that belonged to <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> And is there not <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H2595>spear<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H2719>sword?<s%> for I have <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3947>brought<s%> my <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> my <S%H3627>weapons<s%> with me, <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1697>business<s%> <S%H1961>required<s%> <S%H5169>haste.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H5221>slew<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H425>Elah,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> it is here <S%H3874>wrapped<s%> in a <S%H8071>cloth<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> the <S%H646>ephod:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H3947>take<s%> that, <S%H3947>take<s%> it: for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H2108>save<s%> that <S%H2088>here.<s%> And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> There is <S%H369>none<s%> like that; <S%H5414>give<s%> it me.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> arose <S%H6965><s%>and <S%H1272>fled<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> for <S%H6440>fear<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> to <S%H397>Achish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

And the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H397>Achish<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, Is not <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H776>land?<s%> did they not <S%H6030>sing<s%> one to another of him in <S%H4246>dances,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> has <S%H5221>slain<s%> his <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> his <S%H7233>ten<s%> <S%H7233>thousands?<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7760>laid<s%> up <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in his <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and was <S%H3966>sore<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H397>Achish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1661>Gath.<s%>

And he <S%H8138>changed<s%> his <S%H2940>behavior<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> them, and feigned himself <S%H1984>mad<s%> in their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and <S%H8427>scrabbled<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and let his <S%H7388>spittle<s%> <S%H3381>fall<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> on his <S%H2206>beard.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H397>Achish<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H2009>See,<s%> you <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> is <S%H7696>mad:<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> then have you <S%H935>brought<s%> him to me?

Have I <S%H2638>need<s%> of <S%H7696>mad<s%> men, that you have <S%H935>brought<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> fellow to play the <S%H7696>mad<s%> man in my <S%H5921>presence?<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> fellow <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H1004>house?<s%>
